predicate.note: Frames file for 'wheeze' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 37.3, 43.2, 40.1.1, Framenet entry Motion noise, Communication noise.

example.name: more overacting
example.text: ``I can't make it. You go on without me.'' John wheezed *T* to Mary as they walked from the driveway to the front door.
example.arg: *T* -> I can't make it. You go on without me.
as they walked from the driveway to the front door

example.name: the one example
example.text: One brown two-year-old filly was wheezing from a cold, while another had splints on its legs, [*] keeping both animals from the racetrack.
example.arg: while another had splints on its legs
[*] keeping both animals from the racetrack
